name: Farmer Snake
description:
This is a Unity game created in 5 days for the Ethios Game Jam.
The theme was Trade.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

Farmer Snake is a take on the classic game Snake, putting you in the skin of a wheat-farming snake with an obscure medical condition. In the midst of an economic crisis, you must sell wheat as fast as you can to purchase anti-growth medicine. Aside from this, you must avoid gates, strangely solid bushes, and your own tough hide. 

At the same time you will need to watch for the comicly fluctuating wheat market. You wouldn't want to sell all your wheat for $0.05!

Controls
Movement - Arrow Keys 
Pause - Escape

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

All programming, sound effects, and art were done by me.
Music generously provided by my friend Sorgklaan.
Programs and plug-ins used were Unity, Audacity, Krita, Tiled,  and SuperTiled2Unity.
